distributeSeasonRewards(address,uint256).details: Only owner can distribute season rewards

emergencyRecoverSeasonPool(uint256).details: Only owner - use if season never completes or predictor contract fails

returns.awayOdds: Array of away win odds (1e18 scale)
returns.homeOdds: Array of home win odds (1e18 scale)

getCurrentParlayMultiplier(uint256,uint2.details: Shows users what multiplier they'll get with FOMO tier visibility

params.numLegs: Number of legs in the parlay

returns.currentMultiplier: The multiplier they would get now (1e18 scale)
returns.nextTierMultiplier: What multiplier drops to in next tier
returns.parlaysLeftInTier: How many parlays left in current tier

getLockedOdds(uint256,uint256).details: These odds NEVER change after seeding, even as bets come in

returns.odds: The current market odds in 1e18 scale (e.g., 2.5e18 = 2.5x)

returns.parlayCount: Number of parlays placed in the round
returns.totalBetVolume: Total amount bet in the round (including bonuses)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amount: Total LEAGUE to bet (protocol bonus added on top)

previewBetPayout(uint256).details: Uses locked multiplier from bet placement for accurate preview

previewMatchOdds(uint256,uint256).details: Shows initial seeded odds for a match based on team matchup

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

seedRoundPools(uint256).details: Uses hybrid model: pseudo-random for rounds 1-3, stats-based for rounds 4+

settleRound(uint256).details: Only owner can settle to prevent frontrunning and ensure proper timing

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimWinnings(uint256,uint256).notice: Claim winnings for a bet (pull pattern)

distributeSeasonRewards(address,uint256).notice: Distribute season rewards to specified address

emergencyRecoverSeasonPool(uint256).notice: Emergency recovery of season pool funds

finalizeRoundRevenue(uint256).notice: Distribute net revenue after all claims (or after timeout)

getAllMatchOdds(uint256).notice: Get odds for all 10 matches in a round

getCurrentParlayMultiplier(uint256,uint2.notice: Get current parlay multiplier for a bet (preview before placing)

getLockedOdds(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the locked odds for a match (fixed at seeding time)

getMarketOdds(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Calculate current market odds for a match outcome

getRoundAccounting(uint256).notice: Get round accounting data including parlay count

placeBet(uint256[],uint8[],uint256).notice: Place a bet on multiple match outcomes

previewMatchOdds(uint256,uint256).notice: Get preview of match odds before any bets (for frontend)

seedRoundPools(uint256).notice: Seed match pools at round start with DYNAMIC differentiated odds

settleRound(uint256).notice: Settle round after VRF generates results
